evidence.claim: UniCare complies with HIPAA regulations and utilizes X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange (EDI) purposes.
UniCare adopts FHIR standards in their data exchange operations to facilitate interoperability within health data systems.
UniCare engages with EHR systems for data integration, enhancing their service delivery via established health-tech workflows.
Recognition of using EDI transaction sets, including X12, to ensure compliance and efficiency in handling claims and healthcare transactions.
Wellpoint, UniCare's parent company, leverages AWS for scalable cloud services, enhancing their health-tech platform.

icp.icp_reason: Engages with X12 and EDI indicating potential to integrate with API-first platforms.
